name: The Darkest Hour Of Us
description:
The Darkest Hour Of us - 2D action game with rpg elements. Events take place in dark world, where humanity was turned into horrifying monsters due to spreading of the strange plague. Your main purpose to purify this evil and kill hordes of enemies with different instruments and help last survivors to offend. Game will feature various dialogues, enemies, bosses, weapons, skills and locations to explore. While you are traveling in this world - you will be able to uncover secrets of yourself and your past.

In the reality there is almost nothing of these features in the game. I do everything on my own and that's why The Darkest Hour Of Us needs your help. I will be glad every single comment or opinion, or maybe donation to improve or fix diiferent aspects of the game.

You can always contact me: alifanov.vitalik@yandex.ru
